instruction: Given a person's name, create a fictional story with that person as the protagonist.
output: Jorge was the new kid in town. He was an outcast who never felt like he fit in. But little did anyone know, Jorge had inherited a magical ability from his ancestors. He was able to wield powerful spells and use them to protect his town from impending doom. Jorge soon became a hero as he vanquished the evil villains and saved his town.
